title: The Misery

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Tell yourself you're the greatest at a target's house, allowing you to win with them and everyone that visits them.
-Spare the sympathy at a target's house. If they can win with you, you will set your defense to Their Defense+1.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Everybody wants to be your enemy, meaning you cannot win with anyone and all roles must see you dead by the end of the game to win.
-You will know everyone that can win with you at all times.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until the end of the game

desc:
Post 2391
*But once you turn they hate uuuuus*
